ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of MARIE LEMAY of Chelsea, Quebec, to be Associate Deputy Minister of the Office of Infrastructure of Canada, to be styled Associate Deputy Minister of Infrastructure, to hold office during pleasure, effective August 27, 2012.
